channel.title: Zenith make a item tradeable
channel.description: i want to make a comp cape tradeable but idk how can any1 help me with this

item.title: Zenith make a item tradeable
item.dc:creator: @13lack_drag 13lack drag
item.description:
@13lack_drag wrote:

iswhoopie:

i want to make a comp cape tradeable but idk how can any1 help me with this

Zenithscape uses ItemConstants.java
So go to Src > com > rs > game > players > content > ItemConstants.java
Find This boolean (should be at the bottom

public static boolean isTradeable(Item item) { if (item.getDefinitions().isDestroyItem() || item.getDefinitions().isLended() || ItemConstants.getItemDefaultCharges(item.getId()) != -1) return false; switch (item.getId()) { default: return true; } } }

Replace it with this

public static boolean isTradeable(Item item) { if (item.getDefinitions().isLended() || ItemConstants.getItemDefaultCharges(item.getId()) != -1) return false; switch (item.getId()) { default: return true; } } }

That should work. If not im not sure; you have to fool around with that boolean

Read full topic
